attributes.action: make it illegal for energy companies to increase the cost of a consumer's supply without first taking a reading of the consumer's meter
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the charge is to be increased on 25 August 2008 (say) but my bill is not received until 30 September 2008, or probably later, it is quite likely that my supplier will guess that my readings were lower on 25 August than they actually were, leading to me being overcharged. At the very least my supplier should give early notification of the date when prices are to increase and ask for a customer meter reading on that date.
